summary: This mod adds a perfect sized player home that has a atmosphere of liveliness and nature. With everything you need, not too much or too little.
descriptionHtml:
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** UPDATE - 7 Nov 2013 **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
I am looking for modders that are willing to help me finish off Nirn Falls Estate. I have not been present on Nexus Mods recently as Life and Work have taken over however I have been motivated to finish off what I started and It is around 60% completed.
I need modders who can work on the following with me:
- Exterior Design
- Scripts
- Interior Design
- Navmash
- Bug Fixing
- And any other modders willing to help out.

This project is very big compared to Nirn Falls Manor.
Nirn Falls Estate will feature:
- A free version, award version and paid version
- Triple Story Estate
- Custom Objects and Textures
- Custom Scripts
- Advanced storage facilities
- Extremely beautiful scenery
- Extremely creative design
- NPCs
- Lots of storage
- Everything one requires for house and more.

[center][IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee474/GameByte_sa/Nirn_Falls_Estate.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee474/GameByte_sa/NirnFallsManor_Main.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** DESCRIPTION **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Skyrim Patch 1.7.7.0 is required to run this mod.

This mod adds a perfect sized player home that has a atmosphere of liveliness and nature. With everything you need, not too much or too little.

[b]MY OTHER MODS:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15381]Creed Hills Estate[/url]
[b]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED MODS:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607]Skyrim HD[/url] - makes your game look extremely beautiful and more realistic.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/url] - With this mod mannequins wont wonder around anymore and it will fix any other problem you have with mannequins. Please endorse this mod as Bethesda could not even post an update for this!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370]Spouses Can Live Everywhere[/url] - With this mod you can move your spouses to live with in any custom house mod.
[b]TRANSLATIONS:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17116]Nirn Falls Manor Czech[/url]
[url=http://modgames.net/load/254-1-0-10944]Nirn Falls Manor Russian[/url] - External Site
[url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?p=195749]Nirn Falls Manor French[/url] - External Site
----------------------------------------------------
[url=http://gamebyte.co.za/index.php/component/content/article/541]Gh0zt W0rkz Homepage[/url]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** CONTENTS OF THE PLAYER HOME **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
4 Chests (1 OUTSIDE)
5 Mannequins
10 Weapon Plaques
9 Weapon Racks
3 Bookshelves
2 Safes
2 Jewelry/Strong Box
2 Large Display Cases
4 Small Display Cases
Secret Room
Alchemy Table
Enchanting Table
Cooking Pot
Forge
Workbench
Grindstone
Chopping Block
Smelter
Tanning Rack
Outside Garden Area
Outside Pool falling into the river
Double Bed
Balcony
Followers Bedroom

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** NOTES **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
If there are any bugs please inform me so I can fix emâ€™ straight away. All the player storage works, no re-spawns.
If you want to update to the latest version of Nirn Falls Manor please make a proper save and remove all the items in the house, replace the esp file with the latest version and then move your things back - this way you won't loose all your things when updating the files.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** KNOWN BUGS/ISSUES **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
* If you are using the Wars in Skyrim IV Mod with Nirn Falls Manor, you mite come upon an Emissary of Manor in the main bedroom that attacks you. There is a 10% chance you might have this happen to you.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** INSTALLATION **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Take the Nirn Falls Manor plugin mod and place it into the DATA folder (The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data). Then remember to tick it under DATA FILES in the launcher.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** UNINSTALLATION **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Delete the plugin file from the DATA folder. Before you remove the plugin file, be sure to remove all your items from the player home or else you will lose all the items stored in the player home. 

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** VERSION HISTORY **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
v 0.9.9 - Initial Release

v 1.0.0 - Added Navmesh (Stabilized)
- Added single stable for horse
- Added very few items
- Fixed floating house in solitude
- Fixed front door misplacement
- Fixed Bedroom Lighting

v 1.0.1 - Fixed Navmesh Statue Entrance
- Cleaned up bad Navmesh

v 1.0.2 - Added 1 more bookshelf
- Added 4 Dagger display cases
- Fixed floor misplacement in armory
- Fixed weird light by secret door

v 1.0.3 - Fixed water/swimming bug
- Fixed FrontDoor (inside the house) misplacement
- Fixed Minor ivy misplacement's

v 1.0.4 - Removed unnecessary cell records to improve compatibility with other mods.

v 1.0.5 - Added Balcony
- Fixed Navmesh (Should be 100% stable)
- Removed unnecessary Navmesh
- Removed unnecessary items

v 1.1.0 - Added DragonPriest Masks Display
- Added Mannequin in Bedroom
- Added Steps in the pool
- Added Critters in needed areas
- Added Small Clutter
- Fixed Various Gaps
- Fixed Lighting
- Removed objects from inappropriate places

v 1.2.0 - Added Basement (A room for followers)
- Added More Shield Racks
- Added More Weapon Racks
- Added Lighting
- Fixed Lighting
- Fixed Ceiling gaps
- Fixed remaining wall gaps
- Fixed Mannequin positions
- Fixed Steam interference
- Fixed Furniture misplacements
- Removed unecessary lighting effects

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** F.A.Q **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b]Q: Will my stuff disappear if I place them in the storage available?[/b]
A: No your stuff will stay there forever, there are no re-spawns.

[b]Q: Will this mod conflict with any other mods?[/b]
A: It could conflict with mods that are in the same location but otherwise it should not conflict with any other mods.

[b]Q: Will there be more features added to this mod?[/b]
A: Yes, more people are requesting I add this or that to make the mod perfect, so eventually I will.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** CREDITS **[/b][/center]
